item.description:
A night out to Mohegan Sun is never a fail. So we're going back on Friday October 14. That night you have the option to see one of the best R&B group of the 90s, the group that bought you the panty droppin' hit "I'll Make Love To You", I'm talking about Boyz II Men.

 

Details for Boyz II Men: The show is free. Show time is at 8pm. Location is the Wolf Den. Since the show is at 8, I will assign the meet up time to be at 7pm. This way we have a 1 hour window to gather up whoever, get a drink and get settled by 8. The show should end around 11. Which is when i want the meetup at Ultra 88 to happen. Someone suggested the Boyz II Men concert as an event. I will talk to that person to be the host of that part, if she can't i will step in.

 

Ultra 88 details: I would like to start Ultra 88 at 11. Of course you can come before and do whatever before then too. Cover Charge is $10.  I'll eventually look into VIP service and post up the details to see what people feel about it.

 

So to recap... Boyz II Men Meetup is @ 7:00pm (location to meet up in the casino is to be determined) performance is FREE .... Ultra 88 Meetup is @ 11:00pm cover charge is $10.

 

See you at the Mohegan on October 14 for Boyz II Men at 7 and Ulltra 88 at 11!!!

 

Christian

(860) 357-7264
item.name: Ultra 88 Night Club + Boyz II Men @ Mohegan Sun
